timeline.message:
Move analysis/mappings stats to cluster-stats.

Closes #51138

timeline.bodyText: I think both count and indexCount are useful. Was there a specific reason why it wasn't included in the change to the xpack usage api initially?
timeline.author: martijnvg

replies.bodyText: I mostly added statistics because the API name suggests so. I suspect that the number of clusters that used a field is going to be much more interesting than the number of indices or fields.
replies.author: jpountz
